fr.sii.ogham.core.resource.resolver

Class RelativeResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.resource.resolver.RelativeResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceResolver

    public class RelativeResolver
extends Object
implements ResourceResolver

    Decorator resource resolver that use prefix and suffix for resource resolution.

    For example, the prefix values "email/user/" and the suffix is ".html". The resource name is "hello". This resource resolver appends the prefix, the resource name and the suffix generating the path "email/user/hello.html".

    Once the path is generated, then this implementation delegates the real resource resolution to another implementation.

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Constructor Detail

      • RelativeResolver

        public RelativeResolver(ResourceResolver delegate,
                        String prefix)
        Initialize the resolver with the mandatory delegate and a prefix. No suffix will be appended to the resource path.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the resolver that will do the real resource resolution
        prefix - a string to add before the resource path

      • RelativeResolver

        public RelativeResolver(ResourceResolver delegate,
                        String prefix,
                        String suffix)
        Initialize the resolver with the mandatory delegate, a prefix and a suffix.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the resolver that will do the real resource resolution
        prefix - a string to add before the resource path
        suffix - a string to add after the resource path
